price: 17. Dan zal tegen hen gezegd worden: “Dit is (het vuur) wat jullie ontkenden!”
arabic: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: thumma yuqālu hādhā alladhī kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
